original: chos kyi rang bzhin ni gcig tu zad do //
analyzed: chos kyi rang bzhin ni gcig tu zad do //
translated: The nature of phenomena is just one.🔽That which is the nature of phenomena is not a nature.

original: chos kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni rang bzhin ma yin pa'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa shes bya dang shes pa nyid du yongs su ston pa chags pa'i mtha' thams cad yongs su spong ba'i don can gyi gang gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: chos kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni rang bzhin ma yin pa'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa shes bya dang shes pa nyid du yongs su ston pa chags pa'i mtha' thams cad yongs su spong ba'i don can gyi gang gsungs pa yin no //
translated: This and so forth is taught in order to completely abandon all extreme attachments that are fully revealed as the knower and the known.

original: zad pa nyid ni gang gi phyir //
analyzed: zad pa nyid ni gang gi phyir //
translated: Because of the exhaustion itself,

original: mthong ba la sogs bkag pa yis //🔽de ni rtogs par dka' bar bshad //
analyzed: mthong ba la sogs bkag pa yis // de ni rtogs par dka' bar bshad //
translated: Through the negation of seeing and so forth,

original: ces bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: ces bya ba gsungs te /
translated: It is explained as difficult to realize.

original: mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / nges pa dang / rnam par shes pa bkag pas na de gzugs la sogs par mngon par rtogs par dka' ba shes pa dang shes bya mnyam pa nyid du sngon du ston @114b par byed pas gang gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / nges pa dang / rnam par shes pa bkag pas na de gzugs la sogs par mngon par rtogs par dka' ba shes pa dang shes bya mnyam pa nyid du sngon du ston @114b par byed pas gang gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Because of the negation of seeing, hearing, cognition, and consciousness, it is explained as difficult to realize, as the equality of the knower and the known, which is taught by the one who reveals this beforehand.

original: yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ltar rtogs par dka' ba'i rgyu ni ci zhig yin zhe na /
analyzed: yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ltar rtogs par dka' ba'i rgyu ni ci zhig yin zhe na /
translated: What is the cause of the difficulty of realizing that perfection of wisdom?

original: gang gi phyir /
analyzed: gang gi phyir /
translated: Because of the exhaustion itself,

original: gzugs la sogs par mi shes phyir //
analyzed: gzugs la sogs par mi shes phyir //
translated: Because it is not known as form and so on,

original: de ni bsam mi khyab par 'dod //
analyzed: de ni bsam mi khyab par 'dod //
translated: it is asserted to be inconceivable.

original: ces bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: ces bya ba gsungs te /
translated: This is stated.

original: gzugs nas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du mi shes pa'i phyir 'di'i bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid shes pa mnyam pa nyid du ston par gang gsungs pa yin no //🔽de ltar byas na /
analyzed: gzugs nas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du mi shes pa'i phyir 'di'i bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid shes pa mnyam pa nyid du ston par gang gsungs pa yin no // de ltar byas na /
translated: Because it is not known from form up to the eighteen distinct qualities of the Buddha, the inconceivability of this is taught to be the equality of knowing.🔽Thus,

original: de ltar kun shes nyid lugs la //
analyzed: de ltar kun shes nyid lugs la //
translated: in this way, the system of complete knowing🔽is the complete division of

original: mi mthun phyogs dang gnyen po dag / rnam par phye ba ma lus pa //🔽ji skad bshad pa 'dir shes bya //
analyzed: mi mthun phyogs dang gnyen po dag / rnam par phye ba ma lus pa // ji skad bshad pa 'dir shes bya //
translated: the opposing factors and their antidotes.

original: zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: This is to be understood as it has been explained.

original: da ni sbyor ba brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: da ni sbyor ba brjod par bya'o //
translated: Now the application will be explained.

original: de'ang rnam pa bcur 'gyur bas de'i phyir /
analyzed: de'ang rnam pa bcur 'gyur bas de'i phyir /
translated: Since that is tenfold, therefore:🔽Form and so on, impermanence and so on,🔽not complete and complete,

original: gzugs sogs de mi rtag sogs dang // de ma rdzogs dang rab rdzogs dang // de la chags pa med nyid la //
analyzed: gzugs sogs de mi rtag sogs dang // de ma rdzogs dang rab rdzogs dang // de la chags pa med nyid la //
translated: and nonattachment to that,

original: spyod pa bkag pas sbyor ba dang // mi 'gyur byed po min nyid dang // sbyor ba bkag pa rnams gsum dang // skal ba ji bzhin 'bras thob pas //
analyzed: spyod pa bkag pas sbyor ba dang // mi 'gyur byed po min nyid dang // sbyor ba bkag pa rnams gsum dang // skal ba ji bzhin 'bras thob pas //
translated: And the attainment of the result according to one's fortune.

original: 'bras yod 'dod pa'i de dang ni //
analyzed: 'bras yod 'dod pa'i de dang ni //
translated: The existence of the result is asserted,🔽And that which is not dependent on another,

original: gzhan la rag las min gang dang // snang ba rnam bdun shes byed do //
analyzed: gzhan la rag las min gang dang // snang ba rnam bdun shes byed do //
translated: And the seven appearances are to be known.

original: zhes bya ba gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs pa yin te /
translated: This is what is stated.

original: de la gzugs la sogs pa'i sbyor ba ni /
analyzed: de la gzugs la sogs pa'i sbyor ba ni /
translated: Among them, the engagement with form and so on is as follows:

original: gal te gzugs la spyod na /
analyzed: gal te gzugs la spyod na /
translated: If one engages with form,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes bya ba nas /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes bya ba nas /
translated: One engages with the perfection of wisdom.

original: de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa bkag pa dang / spyod pa de rjes su gnang bas gang gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa bkag pa dang / spyod pa de rjes su gnang bas gang gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Thus, by refuting engagement up to the knowledge of all aspects, and by allowing that engagement, it is what is stated.

original: gzugs la sogs pa mi rtag pa la sogs pa'i sbyor ba ni phung po rnams nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rtag pa dang mi rtag pa la sogs pa'i spyod pa bkag pas snga ma bzhin te /
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa mi rtag pa la sogs pa'i sbyor ba ni phung po rnams nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rtag pa dang mi rtag pa la sogs pa'i spyod pa bkag pas snga ma bzhin te /
translated: The application of impermanence to form and so on is the negation of the practice of permanence and impermanence in regard to the aggregates up to the knowledge of all aspects, as before.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: gzugs la sogs pa ni de bzhin du med pa nyid kyis so zhes gang gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa ni de bzhin du med pa nyid kyis so zhes gang gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Because form and so on do not exist in that way.

original: gzugs la sogs pa rdzogs pa dang ma rdzogs pa'i sbyor ba ni /
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa rdzogs pa dang ma rdzogs pa'i sbyor ba ni /
translated: The application of the completion and non-completion of form and so on is

original: gzhan yang gzugs la sogs pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang yongs su rdzogs pa'i spyod pa bkag pa ni snga ma bzhin te /
analyzed: gzhan yang gzugs la sogs pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang yongs su rdzogs pa'i spyod pa bkag pa ni snga ma bzhin te /
translated: the negation of the practice of the completion and non-completion of form and so on, as before.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'di rnams kyi @115a * //
analyzed: 'di rnams kyi @115a * //
translated: Because these

original: yongs su ma rdzogs pa nyid la de ni kho bo bkag pa nyid kyis gang gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: yongs su ma rdzogs pa nyid la de ni kho bo bkag pa nyid kyis gang gsungs pa yin no //
translated: are not completed. That is what was said by the negation itself.

original: gzugs la sogs pa la chags pa med pa'i sbyor ba ni /
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa la chags pa med pa'i sbyor ba ni /
translated: The application of non-attachment to form and so on is🔽the negation of the practice of attachment and non-attachment to form and so on, as before.🔽Why is that?🔽Because these🔽are not non-attached. That is what was said by the negation itself.

original: yang de rnams la ma chags pa nyid kyi spyod pa ni snga ma bzhin du gang gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: yang de rnams la ma chags pa nyid kyi spyod pa ni snga ma bzhin du gang gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Moreover, the practice of non-attachment to those is just as previously stated.

original: gzhan du mi 'gyur ba'i sbyor ba ni /
analyzed: gzhan du mi 'gyur ba'i sbyor ba ni /
translated: The application of non-differentiation is

original: sbyor ba de nam mkha'i bsngags pa'am bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod pa dang 'dra ba chos zab mo 'di bstan pa dang ma bstan pa dag gis 'phel ba dang 'grib pa med par gang gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: sbyor ba de nam mkha'i bsngags pa'am bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod pa dang 'dra ba chos zab mo 'di bstan pa dang ma bstan pa dag gis 'phel ba dang 'grib pa med par gang gsungs pa yin te /
translated: the application that is like the sky, which is said to be without increase or decrease due to the teaching or non-teaching of this profound Dharma.

original: don ci zhig yin zhe na /
analyzed: don ci zhig yin zhe na /
translated: What is the meaning?

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshig gi yul ma yin pa'i phyir bstan pa nyid der 'phel ba'am yongs su 'grib pa yin gyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshig gi yul ma yin pa'i phyir bstan pa nyid der 'phel ba'am yongs su 'grib pa yin gyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma yin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not the domain of words, so it is taught that it increases or decreases in the teaching, but not the perfection of wisdom.

original: byed pa po'i sbyor ba ni /
analyzed: byed pa po'i sbyor ba ni /
translated: The application of the agent is

original: sbyor ba de ni sgyu ma'i skyes bu bsngags pa'am bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod pa dag gis rjes su chags pa dang khong khro ba med pa dang 'dra bar de bstan pa dang ma bstan pa dag gis 'phel ba dang yongs su 'grib pa med par gang
analyzed: sbyor ba de ni sgyu ma'i skyes bu bsngags pa'am bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod pa dag gis rjes su chags pa dang khong khro ba med pa dang 'dra bar de bstan pa dang ma bstan pa dag gis 'phel ba dang yongs su 'grib pa med par gang
translated: That practice is like the praise or blame of an illusory person, without attachment or aversion, because of which there is no increase or decrease, whether or not it is taught.

original: gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: gsungs pa yin no //
translated: This is what is said.

original: bya dka' ba'i sbyor ba ni bya dka' ba rnam pa gsum nyid do //
analyzed: bya dka' ba'i sbyor ba ni bya dka' ba rnam pa gsum nyid do //
translated: The practice that is difficult to do is just the three difficult things to do.

original: ched du dka' ba nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de /
analyzed: ched du dka' ba nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de /
translated: The difficulty itself is the knowledge of all things.

original: de nyid kyi phyir gang dag de la sbyor bar 'dod pa de dag ni nam mkha' yongs su grol bar 'dod pa yin no //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir gang dag de la sbyor bar 'dod pa de dag ni nam mkha' yongs su grol bar 'dod pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, those who want to practice that want to liberate space.

original: sbyor ba bya dka' ba nyid ni lam shes pa nyid de /
analyzed: sbyor ba bya dka' ba nyid ni lam shes pa nyid de /
translated: The practice that is difficult to do is the knowledge of the path.

original: gang dag de la 'bad par 'dod pa de dag ni nam mkha' bar snang la 'degs par 'dod pa yin no //
analyzed: gang dag de la 'bad par 'dod pa de dag ni nam mkha' bar snang la 'degs par 'dod pa yin no //
translated: Those who want to strive for that want to lift up space.

original: las bya dka' ba nyid ni thams cad shes pa nyid de gang dag de la rtsol bar 'dod pa de dag ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thob pa nyid do //
analyzed: las bya dka' ba nyid ni thams cad shes pa nyid de gang dag de la rtsol bar 'dod pa de dag ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thob pa nyid do //
translated: The difficult task is the knowledge of all things, and those who wish to strive in that attain the perfection of effort.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis sems can tshad med pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar mdzad kyang sems can gyi khams la 'grib pa'am gang ba med do zhes gang gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis sems can tshad med pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar mdzad kyang sems can gyi khams la 'grib pa'am gang ba med do zhes gang gsungs pa yin no //
translated: The Tathagatas of the ten directions, although they bring countless beings to Nirvana, do not diminish or increase the realm of beings.

original: 'bras bu yod pa'i sbyor ba ni /
analyzed: 'bras bu yod pa'i sbyor ba ni /
translated: The application of fruitful activity is that,

original: gang yang rung ba zhig la dge slong gcig ces ming du ma bstan pa'i rjes su mthun pa'i rtogs pa nye bar bkod pas 'khor gzhan gang yin pa @115b dag gis kyang skal pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa thob par ston pas gang gsungs pa yin
analyzed: gang yang rung ba zhig la dge slong gcig ces ming du ma bstan pa'i rjes su mthun pa'i rtogs pa nye bar bkod pas 'khor gzhan gang yin pa @115b dag gis kyang skal pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa thob par ston pas gang gsungs pa yin
translated: in whatever is taught, by the mere indication of the name of a single monk, the other members of the assembly attain understanding according to their lot, through the presentation of a corresponding realization.

original: no // gzhan gyi rkyen gyis mi 'gro ba'i sbyor ba ni /
analyzed: no // gzhan gyi rkyen gyis mi 'gro ba'i sbyor ba ni /
translated: The application of not going by another's condition is that,

original: brgya byin gyis bsrung ba dang / bskyab par khas blangs pa ni /
analyzed: brgya byin gyis bsrung ba dang / bskyab par khas blangs pa ni /
translated: Śakra’s promise to protect and guard is

original: sgyu ma dang / smig rgyu la sogs pa dang 'dra bar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang / rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo srung ba la sogs pa byed par sems pa de ni bsams pa ltar mi 'grub cing dub pa'i skal ba can du 'gyur ro zhes gang gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: sgyu ma dang / smig rgyu la sogs pa dang 'dra bar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang / rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo srung ba la sogs pa byed par sems pa de ni bsams pa ltar mi 'grub cing dub pa'i skal ba can du 'gyur ro zhes gang gsungs pa yin no //
translated: like an illusion, a mirage, etc. The bodhisattva who abides in the perfection of wisdom, and the son or daughter of good lineage who thinks to protect, etc., will not accomplish what they think, and will have the misfortune of exhaustion.

original: rnam pa bdun du snang ba'i shes pa'i sbyor ba ni yongs su 'gyur ba dang / mnyan du tshogs pa dang / 'gal ba dang / rkyen dang / mi 'pho brten med pa dang / byed pa po ma yin par snang ba rnams kyis chos rnams rmi lam lta bu la sogs par dris pa thams cad shes pa la nyan thos la sogs pa'i dbang du byas nas dpe'i don 'thad par byas pas gang gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: rnam pa bdun du snang ba'i shes pa'i sbyor ba ni yongs su 'gyur ba dang / mnyan du tshogs pa dang / 'gal ba dang / rkyen dang / mi 'pho brten med pa dang / byed pa po ma yin par snang ba rnams kyis chos rnams rmi lam lta bu la sogs par dris pa thams cad shes pa la nyan thos la sogs pa'i dbang du byas nas dpe'i don 'thad par byas pas gang gsungs pa yin no //
translated: The sevenfold application of consciousness appearing as form and so on is fully transformed, is heard, is contradictory, is a condition, is not transferred, is not a support, and is not an agent. All phenomena are like dreams and so on.

original: sbyor ba bshad zin to /
analyzed: sbyor ba bshad zin to /
translated: The application has been explained.

original: // / da ni mnyam pa nyid brjod par bya ba yin pas /
analyzed: // / da ni mnyam pa nyid brjod par bya ba yin pas /
translated: Now, equality should be stated, so it is said:

original: gzugs la sogs pa rlom med pa //
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa rlom med pa //
translated: Not conceiving form and so on,

original: rnam bzhi de yi mnyam pa nyid //🔽ces gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: rnam bzhi de yi mnyam pa nyid // ces gsungs pa yin no //
translated: the four equalities of that.

original: ji ltar na rnam pa bzhi yin zhe na ;🔽gzugs rlom sems su mi byed /🔽gzugs kyis rlom sems su mi byed /
analyzed: ji ltar na rnam pa bzhi yin zhe na ; gzugs rlom sems su mi byed / gzugs kyis rlom sems su mi byed /
translated: How is it fourfold?🔽One does not conceive form.🔽One does not conceive form as the self.

original: gzugs bdag gis zhes bya bar rlom sems su mi byed //
analyzed: gzugs bdag gis zhes bya bar rlom sems su mi byed //
translated: One does not conceive, form is mine.

original: gzugs la rlom sems su mi byed ces gang gsungs pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la yang de bzhin du brjod par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: gzugs la rlom sems su mi byed ces gang gsungs pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la yang de bzhin du brjod par bya ba yin no //
translated: It is said, One does not falsely project form, and the same should be said up to the knowledge of all aspects.

original: da ni mthong ba'i lam brjod par bya ba yin pas na de'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni mthong ba'i lam brjod par bya ba yin pas na de'i phyir /
translated: Now, since the path of seeing is to be described, therefore:

original: sangs rgyas kyi mthus lha'i rigs thams cad kyis phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing sangs rgyas stong dang / 'phags pa byams pa la sogs pa bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas rnam pa 'di lta bur chad pa dang lhag pa med par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa rnams sems kyis mthong bar gyur pas gang gsungs pas ni mthong ba'i lam gyi skad
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi mthus lha'i rigs thams cad kyis phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing sangs rgyas stong dang / 'phags pa byams pa la sogs pa bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas rnam pa 'di lta bur chad pa dang lhag pa med par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa rnams sems kyis mthong bar gyur pas gang gsungs pas ni mthong ba'i lam gyi skad
translated: By the power of the Buddha, all the divine clans see with their minds the teachings of the perfection of wisdom, just as they were taught, without any omission or addition, by a thousand Buddhas in each of the ten directions, and by the noble Maitreya and other Buddhas of the Fortunate Eon.

original: cig ma bcu drug las gtogs pa skad cig ma gzhan med par shes par byed pa la dbang por @116a * //🔽dgod pa'i phyir yin no //
analyzed: cig ma bcu drug las gtogs pa skad cig ma gzhan med par shes par byed pa la dbang por @116a * //🔽dgod pa'i phyir yin no //
translated: This is stated to make one understand that there is no other moment included in the sixteen moments of the path of seeing, and to establish it as the faculty.

original: de la 'das pa'i sangs rgyas ma brjod pa de ni de'i bstan pa mthar thug pa shes par bya ba'i don du yin no //
analyzed: de la 'das pa'i sangs rgyas ma brjod pa de ni de'i bstan pa mthar thug pa shes par bya ba'i don du yin no //
translated: The unexpressed Buddhas of the past are for the purpose of knowing the ultimate of their teachings.

original: ma 'ongs pa brjod pa ni ma 'ongs pa'i sems can rnams kyi don gyi dgos pa bstan par bya ba'i don du yin no //
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa brjod pa ni ma 'ongs pa'i sems can rnams kyi don gyi dgos pa bstan par bya ba'i don du yin no //
translated: The expressed future is for the purpose of teaching the need for the benefit of future sentient beings.

original: grangs stong gi nges pa ni 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du bskal pa bzang po grangs stong du grags pa nyid kyi thabs la mkhas pas gzhan sgrub pa dang dag pa med par shes par bya ba'i don du yin no //
analyzed: grangs stong gi nges pa ni 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du bskal pa bzang po grangs stong du grags pa nyid kyi thabs la mkhas pas gzhan sgrub pa dang dag pa med par shes par bya ba'i don du yin no //
translated: The certainty of a thousand is for the purpose of knowing the skillful means of establishing others in the good eon known as the thousand eons in the world system of Patient Endurance.

original: mthong ba'i lam gyi skad cig ma bcu drug gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: mthong ba'i lam gyi skad cig ma bcu drug gang yin zhe na /
translated: What are the sixteen moments of the path of seeing?

original: sdug bsngal la sogs bden pa rnams //
analyzed: sdug bsngal la sogs bden pa rnams //
translated: The truths of suffering and so on

original: chos shes rjes su shes pa dang // shes pa'i skad cig bdag nyid 'di //
analyzed: chos shes rjes su shes pa dang // shes pa'i skad cig bdag nyid 'di //
translated: are the nature of Dharma knowledge, subsequent knowledge and knowledge.

original: kun shes tshul la mthong ba'i lam //
analyzed: kun shes tshul la mthong ba'i lam //
translated: This is the path of seeing in the system of complete knowledge.

original: zhes bya ba gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs pa yin no //
translated: This is stated.

original: de la sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: de la sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa ni 'di yin te /
translated: The forbearance that is Dharma knowledge of the truth of suffering is as follows.

original: gzugs rtag ces bya ba dang mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
analyzed: gzugs rtag ces bya ba dang mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
translated: It is stated that the Buddha would not teach the Dharma that form is permanent or impermanent, and so on, up to🔽he would not teach the Dharma that omniscience is past, future, or present.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'das zhes bya ba'am ma 'ongs zhes bya ba'am da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro zhes pa'i bar gnyen po dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi rnam par rtog pa phyin ci log gi rnam pa can bkag🔽pas gang gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'das zhes bya ba'am ma 'ongs zhes bya ba'am da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro zhes pa'i bar gnyen po dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi rnam par rtog pa phyin ci log gi rnam pa can bkag pas gang gsungs pa yin no //
translated: The Buddha has stopped the conception of the antidote and the conception of the object to be abandoned, which have the aspect of error.

original: sdug bsngal la chos shes pa ni /
analyzed: sdug bsngal la chos shes pa ni /
translated: Dharma knowledge of the truth of suffering is as follows.

original: gzugs shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
analyzed: gzugs shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
translated: He would teach the Dharma that form is extremely pure, and so on, up to

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro zhes ji skad du brjod pa'i rnam par rtog pa gnyis po med pa phyin ci ma log pa'i rnam par chos ston
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro zhes ji skad du brjod pa'i rnam par rtog pa gnyis po med pa phyin ci ma log pa'i rnam par chos ston
translated: The two kinds of conceptual thought that were mentioned, namely, form is pure up to the knowledge of all modes is pure, do not exist.

original: par rjes su gnang ba nyid kyis gang gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: par rjes su gnang ba nyid kyis gang gsungs pa yin no //
translated: The Lord has given permission to teach the Dharma in a way that is free from error.

original: sdug bsngal la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa ni /
analyzed: sdug bsngal la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa ni /
translated: The acceptance of the knowledge of the path of the realization of suffering

original: gzugs la sogs pa nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yongs su dag pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa nyid du gang gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yongs su dag pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa nyid du gang gsungs pa yin no //
translated: is the statement, The perfection of wisdom is pure because form, etc. up to the knowledge of all modes is pure.

original: sdug bsngal la rjes su shes pa ni //
analyzed: sdug bsngal la rjes su shes pa ni //
translated: The knowledge of the path of the realization of suffering

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: rab 'byor gzugs la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag @116b pa med pa zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
analyzed: rab 'byor gzugs la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag @116b pa med pa zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
translated: Subhuti, it is because form, etc. up to the knowledge of all modes, is neither produced nor stopped, etc.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la skye ba dang 'gag pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba bkag pa'i yongs su dag pa nyid kyis gang gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la skye ba dang 'gag pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba bkag pa'i yongs su dag pa nyid kyis gang gsungs pa yin no //
translated: up to the knowledge of all modes, by the purity of the negation of origination and cessation, of defilement and purification.

original: kun 'byung la chos shes pa'i bzod pa ni /
analyzed: kun 'byung la chos shes pa'i bzod pa ni /
translated: The acquiescence in the knowledge of the Teaching with regard to the origin🔽.

original: bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam mkha' yongs su dag pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam mkha' yongs su dag pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
translated: The Lord: Subhuti, how is the perfection of wisdom pure because of the purity of space?

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du ji skad du bshad pa'i rnam pa bkag pa'i yongs su dag pa ni /🔽yongs su dag pa yin pa nyid kyis gang gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du ji skad du bshad pa'i rnam pa bkag pa'i yongs su dag pa ni / yongs su dag pa yin pa nyid kyis gang gsungs pa yin no //
translated: up to the knowledge of all modes, by the purity of the negation of the aspects as they have been explained.

original: kun 'byung la chos shes pa ni /
analyzed: kun 'byung la chos shes pa ni /
translated: The knowledge of the Teaching with regard to the origin🔽.

original: nam mkha' dang 'dra bar gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du gos pa med pa'i phyir 'di gos pa med pa'i rnam par gang gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: nam mkha' dang 'dra bar gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du gos pa med pa'i phyir 'di gos pa med pa'i rnam par gang gsungs pa yin no //
translated: The receptivity to the knowledge of the origin of the Dharma is said to have the aspect of being ungraspable because, like space, it is ungraspable from form up to the knowledge of all aspects.🔽The knowledge of the origin of the Dharma🔽is said to have the aspect of being insubstantial because, like a reflection, it is insubstantial from form up to the knowledge of all aspects.🔽The receptivity to the knowledge of the cessation of the Dharma is said to have the aspect of being non-arising because, like a dream, it is non-arising from form up to the knowledge of all aspects.🔽The knowledge of the cessation of the Dharma is said to have the aspect of being non-cessation because, like an illusion, it is non-cessation from form up to the knowledge of all aspects.🔽The receptivity to the knowledge of the path of the Dharma is said to have the aspect of being naturally luminous because, like space, it is naturally luminous from form up to the knowledge of all aspects.🔽The knowledge of the path of the Dharma is said to have the aspect of being unsoiled because, like space, it is unsoiled from form up to the knowledge of all aspects.

original: kun 'byung la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa ni nam mkha' dang 'dra bar gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du gzung du med pa'i rnam par gang gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: kun 'byung la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa ni nam mkha' dang 'dra bar gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du gzung du med pa'i rnam par gang gsungs pa yin no //
translated: The receptivity to the knowledge of the origin of the Dharma is said to have the aspect of being ungraspable because, like space, it is ungraspable from form up to the knowledge of all aspects.

original: kun 'byung la rjes su shes pa ni //
analyzed: kun 'byung la rjes su shes pa ni //
translated: The knowledge of the origin of the Dharma🔽is said to have the aspect of being insubstantial because, like a reflection, it is insubstantial from form up to the knowledge of all aspects.🔽The receptivity to the knowledge of the cessation of the Dharma is said to have the aspect of being non-arising because, like a dream, it is non-arising from form up to the knowledge of all aspects.🔽The knowledge of the cessation of the Dharma is said to have the aspect of being non-cessation because, like an illusion, it is non-cessation from form up to the knowledge of all aspects.🔽The receptivity to the knowledge of the path of the Dharma is said to have the aspect of being naturally luminous because, like space, it is naturally luminous from form up to the knowledge of all aspects.

original: sgra brnyan gnyis kyi dpes nam mkha' dang 'dra bar gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du tha snyad med pa'i phyir de la tha snyad med pa'i rnam pa tha snyad kyi ngo bo bkag pa'i don gyis gang gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: sgra brnyan gnyis kyi dpes nam mkha' dang 'dra bar gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du tha snyad med pa'i phyir de la tha snyad med pa'i rnam pa tha snyad kyi ngo bo bkag pa'i don gyis gang gsungs pa yin no //
translated: The knowledge of the path of the

original: sgra gnyis dper brjod pa nyan pa po dang 'chad pa po dag gis 'dri ba dang lan 'debs pa'i tha snyad gnyis dang tshul bstun pa'i don du yin no //
analyzed: sgra gnyis dper brjod pa nyan pa po dang 'chad pa po dag gis 'dri ba dang lan 'debs pa'i tha snyad gnyis dang tshul bstun pa'i don du yin no //
translated: The two terms are mentioned as examples for the listener and the expounder to conform to the two conventions of question and answer.

original: 'gog pa la chos shes pa'i bzod pa ni /
analyzed: 'gog pa la chos shes pa'i bzod pa ni /
translated: Acceptance of the knowledge of the factors with regard to cessation

original: nam mkha' dang 'dra bar gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du brjod du med pa'i phyir de rab tu brjod pa'i rnam par rgyud gzhan la don de thob par byed pa bkag pas gang gsungs pa yin te /🔽gzhan la brjod pa ni rab tu brjod pa yin pas so //🔽'gog pa la chos shes pa ni nam mkha' dang 'dra bar gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du dmigs su med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: nam mkha' dang 'dra bar gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du brjod du med pa'i phyir de rab tu brjod pa'i rnam par rgyud gzhan la don de thob par byed pa bkag pas gang gsungs pa yin te / gzhan la brjod pa ni rab tu brjod pa yin pas so // 'gog pa la chos shes pa ni nam mkha' dang 'dra bar gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du dmigs su med pa'i phyir /
translated: is stated to be the cessation of the expression of that object in the continuum of another, because it is inexpressible like space, from form to omniscience.

original: de dmigs su med pa'i rnam par gang gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: de dmigs su med pa'i rnam par gang gsungs pa yin no //
translated: The knowledge of the factors with regard to cessation is stated to be the nonapprehension of that object in the continuum of another, because expression in another is expression.

original: 'gog pa la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa ni /
analyzed: 'gog pa la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa ni /
translated: Acceptance of subsequent knowledge with regard to cessation🔽is stated to be the nonapprehension of that object in one’s own continuum, because it is inexpressible like space, from form to omniscience.

original: @117a * // nam mkha' dang 'dra bar gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du shin tu rnam par dag pa nyid kyis skye ba dang 'gag pa med pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir de shin tu rnam par
analyzed: @117a * // nam mkha' dang 'dra bar gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du shin tu rnam par dag pa nyid kyis skye ba dang 'gag pa med pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir de shin tu rnam par
translated: It is said to be extremely pure because it is like space, without arising or cessation and without affliction or purification, due to the extreme purity of form up to omniscience.

original: dag pa'i rnam par gang gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: dag pa'i rnam par gang gsungs pa yin no //
translated: It is extremely pure.🔽Subsequent knowledge of cessation

original: 'gog pa la rjes su shes pa ni /
analyzed: 'gog pa la rjes su shes pa ni /
translated: is the knowledge of the path.

original: de 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de mig gi nad la sogs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba dang / lha rnams kyang de'i phyi bzhin 'brang bar gyur pa dang / 'di ston pa der yang tshes brgyad dang /
analyzed: de 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de mig gi nad la sogs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba dang / lha rnams kyang de'i phyi bzhin 'brang bar gyur pa dang / 'di ston pa der yang tshes brgyad dang /
translated: The one who upholds, holds, reads, and properly attends to this will not develop eye diseases and so on, the gods will follow him, and on the eighth and fifteenth days of the month, when this is taught, the gods will gather in the assembly hall of Sudharmā in the Heaven of the Thirty-Three and say to each other, “Friends, the one who upholds, holds, reads, and properly attends to this is endowed with such and such qualities.”

original: bcu bzhi dang / bco lnga dag la bstan pa la bsod nams mang po 'phel ba nyid kyis de dag tu lha rnams mchod pa dang rnam par lta ba nye bar gnas pa'i 'thad pa gang gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: bcu bzhi dang / bco lnga dag la bstan pa la bsod nams mang po 'phel ba nyid kyis de dag tu lha rnams mchod pa dang rnam par lta ba nye bar gnas pa'i 'thad pa gang gsungs pa yin no //
translated: and the fourteenth and fifteenth days, the merit of the teaching increases a great deal, and so it is reasonable that on those days the gods make offerings and look on.

original: lam la chos shes pa'i bzod pa ni /
analyzed: lam la chos shes pa'i bzod pa ni /
translated: The forbearance that is knowledge of dharmas with regard to the path

original: rab 'byor de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: rab 'byor de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che ni 'di yin te /
translated: Subhūti, this is the precious perfection of wisdom.

original: zhes bya ba nas brtsams pas thams cad shes pa nyid kyi dbang du byas nas de ngan song thams cad rab tu zhi ba dang rnam par byang ba'i phyogs thams cad rab tu shes pa'i rgyu nyid yin pa'i phyir dga' ba rgyas par byed pas na rin po🔽che yin pa nyid kyis gang gsungs pa yin no //🔽lam la chos shes pa ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba nas brtsams pas thams cad shes pa nyid kyi dbang du byas nas de ngan song thams cad rab tu zhi ba dang rnam par byang ba'i phyogs thams cad rab tu shes pa'i rgyu nyid yin pa'i phyir dga' ba rgyas par byed pas na rin po che yin pa nyid kyis gang gsungs pa yin no // lam la chos shes pa ni /
translated: From here up to the end of the chapter, the Buddha teaches that the perfection of wisdom is a precious jewel because it is the cause for knowing all the aspects of the pacification and purification of all lower rebirths and so on.🔽The knowledge of dharmas with regard to the path

original: yang lam shes pa nyid kyi skabs kyis //
analyzed: yang lam shes pa nyid kyi skabs kyis //
translated: The knowledge of the path🔽In the section on the knowledge of the path,

original: pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che de la ni chos gang yang skye ba'am /
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che de la ni chos gang yang skye ba'am /
translated: In this precious perfection of wisdom, no dharma is produced or stopped,

original: 'gag pa'am / kun nas nyon mongs pa'am /
analyzed: 'gag pa'am / kun nas nyon mongs pa'am /
translated: nor does it cease, nor is it defiled,

original: rnam par byang ba'am /
analyzed: rnam par byang ba'am /
translated: nor is it purified,

original: zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
translated: and so on up to:

original: dge ba'am / mi dge ba'am /
analyzed: dge ba'am / mi dge ba'am /

original: 'dus byas sam /
analyzed: 'dus byas sam /
translated: nor is it compounded,

original: 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang yang dmigs su med do //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang yang dmigs su med do //
translated: nor is it uncompounded.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?🔽Because there is no such dharma.

original: chos de lta bu med pa'i phyir ro zhes chos thams cad la rnam par rtog pa med pas rnam par mi rtog pa'i dge ba ni rang bzhin gyis rin po che yin pa'i don gyis gang gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: chos de lta bu med pa'i phyir ro zhes chos thams cad la rnam par rtog pa med pas rnam par mi rtog pa'i dge ba ni rang bzhin gyis rin po che yin pa'i don gyis gang gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Thus, because of the absence of conceptualization with regard to all dharmas, the virtue of nonconceptualization is said to be the natural jewel.

original: lam la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa ni /
analyzed: lam la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa ni /
translated: The forbearance that is the subsequent cognition of the path is as follows:

original: rab 'byor pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che la ni chos gang gis kyang gos pa med do zhes gang gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: rab 'byor pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che la ni chos gang gis kyang gos pa med do zhes gang gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Subhūti, the jewel of the perfections is not defiled by any dharma.

original: chos thams cad kyi rnam pa dang / @117b rtags dang / mtshan ma rab tu shes so //
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi rnam pa dang / @117b rtags dang / mtshan ma rab tu shes so //
translated: It is the knowledge of the aspects, signs, and characteristics of all dharmas.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi dbang du byas nas chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du stobs su zin kyang chos la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang ma 'brel pas mgos pa'i rin po che'i don gyis gang gsungs pa yin no //

translated: From the perspective of the knowledge of all aspects, although all phenomena are known in all aspects, since they are not associated with conceptualization of phenomena and so on, it is said to have the meaning of the jewel of the crown.🔽Subsequent knowledge of the path is the knowledge of the three jewels.🔽If one does not know the meaning of the three jewels, one does not know the entity.🔽If one does not know the meaning of the three jewels, one does not know the entity.🔽If one does not know the meaning of the three jewels, one does not know the entity.

original: da ltar byung ba ma yin zhes bya ba rnam pa'i tshig bcu dgus lugs las bzlog pa'i rim pa dang po shes pa nyid kyi skabs yongs su rdzogs par ston pa yin te /
analyzed: da ltar byung ba ma yin zhes bya ba rnam pa'i tshig bcu dgus lugs las bzlog pa'i rim pa dang po shes pa nyid kyi skabs yongs su rdzogs par ston pa yin te /
translated: These nineteen phrases show the first stage of the process of reversal, the stage of the knowledge of the path, in its entirety.

original: de ni gzhi thams cad pa nyid kyi chos thams cad la zla dang ldan pa dang / @118a * //
analyzed: de ni gzhi thams cad pa nyid kyi chos thams cad la zla dang ldan pa dang / @118a * //
translated: This is because it is the basis of all, it is associated with the moon of all dharmas,

original: bzlog pa'i zla dang ldan pa'i rnam pa can gyi rnam pa rtog pa bkag pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bzlog pa'i zla dang ldan pa'i rnam pa can gyi rnam pa rtog pa bkag pa'i phyir ro //
translated: and it has the aspect of being associated with the moon of reversal, and it stops the conceptualization of aspects.

original: yang 'di dang zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: yang 'di dang zhes bya ba la /
translated: Again, “this” refers to🔽the perfection of wisdom.

original: rab 'byor de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khams gsum las 'da' bar byed pa ma yin /
analyzed: rab 'byor de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khams gsum las 'da' bar byed pa ma yin /
translated: “Subhūti, it does not cause one to transcend the three realms,

original: thams cad mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings la gnas par byad pa ma yin /
analyzed: thams cad mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings la gnas par byad pa ma yin /
translated: It is not that all of them abide in the basic space of nirvana.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sbyin par byed pa ma yin /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sbyin par byed pa ma yin /
translated: The perfection of generosity does not give anything away.🔽It does not discard stinginess.

original: ser sna 'dor bar byed pa ma yin zhes bya ba nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ster bar byed pa ma yin /
analyzed: ser sna 'dor bar byed pa ma yin zhes bya ba nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ster bar byed pa ma yin /
translated: It does not give away the knowledge of all things.

original: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis 'dor bar byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis 'dor bar byed pa ma yin no //
translated: It does not discard the śrāvaka and pratyekabuddha levels.

original: zhes gang gsungs pa ni de kho na bzhin du gnyis pa lam shes pa nyid kyi skabs yongs su rdzogs par ston pa yin te /
analyzed: zhes gang gsungs pa ni de kho na bzhin du gnyis pa lam shes pa nyid kyi skabs yongs su rdzogs par ston pa yin te /
translated: This is exactly how the second chapter, on the knowledge of the path, is fully taught.

original: de ni 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pas bsdus pa mi mthun pa dang gnyen po'i rnam par rtog pa dag gtan kun tu spyod pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pas bsdus pa mi mthun pa dang gnyen po'i rnam par rtog pa dag gtan kun tu spyod pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because the conceptual thoughts of samsara and nirvana, which are included in the categories of the unfavorable and their antidotes, are never engaged in at all.

original: yang 'di yin te zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: yang 'di yin te zhes bya ba la /
translated: This is also the case with the following.

original: rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so sor ster bar byed pa ma yin /🔽'dor bar byed pa ma yin /
analyzed: rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so sor ster bar byed pa ma yin / 'dor bar byed pa ma yin /
translated: the dharmas of ordinary persons, the dharmas of śrāvakas, or the dharmas of pratyekabuddhas, nor does it discard them.

original: 'dus byas kyi khams dang 'dus ma byas kyi khams ster bar byed pa ma yin /🔽'dor bar byed pa ma yin no //🔽de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: 'dus byas kyi khams dang 'dus ma byas kyi khams ster bar byed pa ma yin / 'dor bar byed pa ma yin no // de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: It does not bestow the compounded element or the uncompounded element, nor does it discard them.🔽Why is that?

original: rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung ma byung yang rung ste chos kyi dbyings 'di gnas pa nyid dang / chos nges pa ni gnas pa yin te /
analyzed: rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung ma byung yang rung ste chos kyi dbyings 'di gnas pa nyid dang / chos nges pa ni gnas pa yin te /
translated: Subhūti, whether tathāgatas arise or do not arise, this dharma-constituent remains, and the fixed sequence of dharmas remains.🔽The Tathāgata has fully awakened to it and realized it.🔽Having fully awakened to it and realized it, he has taught it,🔽he has shown it,🔽he has explained it,

original: de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas la mngon par rtogs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas la mngon par rtogs so //
translated: he has revealed it,🔽he has clarified it,🔽he has analyzed it,🔽he has taught it,🔽he has demonstrated it,🔽he has made it manifest,🔽he has made it understood,🔽he has made it known,🔽he has made it appear,🔽he has made it evident,🔽he has made it clear,🔽he has made it manifest,🔽he has made it evident,

original: mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shing mngon par rtogs nas kyang gsungs par mdzad /🔽ston par mdzad /
analyzed: mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shing mngon par rtogs nas kyang gsungs par mdzad / ston par mdzad /
translated: he has made it clear,🔽he has made it manifest,🔽he has made it evident,🔽he has made it clear,🔽he has made it manifest,🔽he has made it evident,🔽he has made it clear,🔽he has made it manifest,🔽he has made it evident,🔽he has made it clear,🔽he has made it manifest,🔽he has made it evident,🔽he has made it clear,🔽he has made it manifest,🔽he has made it evident,🔽he has made it clear,🔽he has made it manifest,🔽he has made it evident,🔽he has made it clear,🔽he has made it manifest,🔽he has made it evident,🔽he has made it clear,🔽he has made it manifest,🔽he has made it evident,🔽he has made it clear,🔽he has made it manifest,🔽he has made it evident,🔽he has made it clear,🔽he has made it manifest,🔽he has made it evident,🔽he has made it clear,🔽he has made it manifest,🔽he has made it evident,🔽he has made it clear,🔽he has made it manifest,🔽he has made it evident,

original: rnam par 'grel bar mdzad /
analyzed: rnam par 'grel bar mdzad /
translated: he has made it clear,🔽he has

original: rnam par 'byed par mdzad /
analyzed: rnam par 'byed par mdzad /
translated: He analyzes,🔽he illuminates,

original: gsal bar mdzad /🔽yang dag par 'chad par mdzad do zhes gang gsungs pa ni /
analyzed: gsal bar mdzad / yang dag par 'chad par mdzad do zhes gang gsungs pa ni /
translated: he explains perfectly.

original: de kho na bzhin du gsum pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi skabs yongs su rdzogs par ston pa yin te /
analyzed: de kho na bzhin du gsum pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi skabs yongs su rdzogs par ston pa yin te /
translated: This is just as it is taught in the third chapter, the chapter on the knowledge of all aspects, which is taught in its entirety.

original: rang dang gzhan gyi don gyis bsdus pa rnam pa thams cad rtogs pa dang bshad pa'i chos dag gi rgyu de yin par @118b brjod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang dang gzhan gyi don gyis bsdus pa rnam pa thams cad rtogs pa dang bshad pa'i chos dag gi rgyu de yin par @118b brjod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because it is said to be the cause of the Dharma that is to be realized and explained, which is included in the benefit for oneself and others and all aspects.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: Thus,

original: de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa dang / 'chad pa dang / brjod pa dang / 'dogs pa dang / rnam par 'grel pa dang / rnam par 'byed pa dang / smos pa dang / gsal bar byed pa dang / yang dag par rab tu ston pa gang lags pa 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag par bstan pa lags so zhes bya ba bstan pa'i tshig rnams kyi don ni chos rnams kyi rang gi mtshan nyid dang /
analyzed: de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa dang / 'chad pa dang / brjod pa dang / 'dogs pa dang / rnam par 'grel pa dang / rnam par 'byed pa dang / smos pa dang / gsal bar byed pa dang / yang dag par rab tu ston pa gang lags pa 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag par bstan pa lags so zhes bya ba bstan pa'i tshig rnams kyi don ni chos rnams kyi rang gi mtshan nyid dang /
translated: The meaning of the words of the teaching, This is the teaching of the perfection of wisdom, the explanation, the expression, the designation, the elucidation, the analysis, the indication, the clarification, and the full demonstration of the perfection of wisdom, is the intrinsic characteristics of phenomena,

original: rab tu dbye ba'i mtshan nyid dang / ming gi tshogs bstan pa dang / tshig dang ngag rnam par gzhag pa dang / don de gzhan gyi rgyud la nye bar byed pa dang / gdul bya rnams chos 'di la mos par bya ba'i phyir don du nye bar byed pa dang /
analyzed: rab tu dbye ba'i mtshan nyid dang / ming gi tshogs bstan pa dang / tshig dang ngag rnam par gzhag pa dang / don de gzhan gyi rgyud la nye bar byed pa dang / gdul bya rnams chos 'di la mos par bya ba'i phyir don du nye bar byed pa dang /
translated: the characteristics of their divisions, the teaching of the collection of names, the arrangement of words and phrases, the application of that meaning to the mindstreams of others, and the application of the meaning for the sake of inspiring those to be trained in this Dharma.

original: de dag nyid sbyin pa la sogs pa'i bsdu ba'i dngos po mngon par zhen par bya ba dang / brtson 'grus zhan pa rnams la bslab pa thams cad bsdus nas ston pa dang / brtson pa bar ma rnams la smos pa'i chos nyid gsal bar byed pa dang /
analyzed: de dag nyid sbyin pa la sogs pa'i bsdu ba'i dngos po mngon par zhen par bya ba dang / brtson 'grus zhan pa rnams la bslab pa thams cad bsdus nas ston pa dang / brtson pa bar ma rnams la smos pa'i chos nyid gsal bar byed pa dang /
translated: They are for those who are attached to generosity and so on, the means of attracting disciples, for those of weak diligence, for those of middling diligence, for those of sharp diligence, for those who are attached to the three realms, for those who are not attached to the three realms, for those who are attached to the three vehicles, for those who are not attached to the three vehicles, for those who are attached to the two vehicles, for those who are not attached to the two vehicles, for those who are attached to the one vehicle, for those who are not attached to the one vehicle, for those who are attached to the self, for those who are not attached to the self, for those who are attached to sentient beings, for those who are not attached to sentient beings, for those who are attached to life, for those who are not attached to life, for those who are attached to a person, for those who are not attached to a person, for those who are attached to the aggregates, for those who are not attached to the aggregates, for those who are attached to the elements, for those who are not attached to the elements, for those who are attached to the sense sources, for those who are not attached to the sense sources, for those who are attached to the stages, for those who are not attached to the stages, for those who are attached to the perfections, for those who are not attached to the perfections, for those who are attached to the factors of enlightenment, for those who are not attached to the factors of enlightenment, for those who are attached to the factors of discerning insights, for those who are attached to the emptiness, signlessness

original: brtson 'grus lhag pa rnams la chos mtha' dag yang dag par 'chad pa'i dbang du byas nas rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: brtson 'grus lhag pa rnams la chos mtha' dag yang dag par 'chad pa'i dbang du byas nas rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du brjod par bya'o //
translated: They are stated respectively for those who are attached to generosity and so on as the means of attracting disciples, for those of weak diligence who are taught the entire training in brief, for those of middling diligence who are taught the Dharma in detail and for those of superior diligence who are taught the entire Dharma.

original: yang ci'i don gyis lam shes pa nyid bzhin du thams cad shes pa nyid la bsgom pa'i lam logs shig pa med ce na /🔽nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi phun sum tshogs pa ni /
analyzed: yang ci'i don gyis lam shes pa nyid bzhin du thams cad shes pa nyid la bsgom pa'i lam logs shig pa med ce na / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi phun sum tshogs pa ni /
translated: Why is the path of meditation not separately classified as the knowledge of all aspects as it is for the knowledge of the path?🔽The sutras state:🔽Shravakas and pratyekabuddhas transcend sorrow by observing and seeing the excellence of bodhisattvas through the knowledge and seeing of bodhisattvas.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa dang mthong bas bltas nas 'da'o zhes gsungs pas na 'di ni gzhan gtsor byed pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar dgongs pa yin no //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa dang mthong bas bltas nas 'da'o zhes gsungs pas na 'di ni gzhan gtsor byed pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar dgongs pa yin no //
translated: Therefore it is the intention that this is for the sake of others.

original: gzhan yang rgyun tu zhugs pa nas rang sangs rgyas kyi bar gyi shes pa dang spong ba gang yin pa de ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa yin no zhes gang gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: gzhan yang rgyun tu zhugs pa nas rang sangs rgyas kyi bar gyi shes pa dang spong ba gang yin pa de ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa yin no zhes gang gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Moreover, the knowledge and abandonment of stream-enterers up to pratyekabuddhas is the acquiescence to the non-arising of dharmas.

original: bzod pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: bzod pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is acquiescence?

original: sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa'o //
analyzed: sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa'o //
translated: It is acquiescence to the knowledge of dharmas with regard to suffering.

original: 'di ga las shes she na /
analyzed: 'di ga las shes she na /
translated: How is this known?

original: lam gzhan khyad par yod pa ma yin /
analyzed: lam gzhan khyad par yod pa ma yin /
translated: Because there is no other path.

original: rigs dang dbang po dang tshogs khyad zhugs par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rigs dang dbang po dang tshogs khyad zhugs par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is a difference in lineage, faculties, and accumulations.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa'i byed par gzhan rnams kyis rtogs pa'i byed pa ma lus pa 'dus par 'gyur ba'i phyir /🔽de dag gi shes @119a * //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa'i byed par gzhan rnams kyis rtogs pa'i byed pa ma lus pa 'dus par 'gyur ba'i phyir / de dag gi shes @119a * //
translated: Because the activity of the acquiescence of the bodhisattva is the collection of all the activities of the realization of others.

original: pa dang spangs pa gang yin pa de de'i bzod pa yin gyi /
analyzed: pa dang spangs pa gang yin pa de de'i bzod pa yin gyi /
translated: The knowledge and abandonment of those is his acquiescence.

original: rtogs pa'i tshad 'di tsam ma yin no //
analyzed: rtogs pa'i tshad 'di tsam ma yin no //
translated: This is not the measure of realization.

original: zhes bya ba ni rnam grangs gzhan yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rnam grangs gzhan yin no //
translated: This is another enumeration.

original: de ltar byas na /
analyzed: de ltar byas na /
translated: If it is so,

original: shes pas srid la mi gnas shing //
analyzed: shes pas srid la mi gnas shing //
translated: knowledge does not abide in existence.

original: snying rjes zhi la mi gnas dang // thabs ma yin pas ring ba dang // thabs kyis ring ba ma yin nyid //
analyzed: snying rjes zhi la mi gnas dang // thabs ma yin pas ring ba dang // thabs kyis ring ba ma yin nyid //
translated: Through compassion, he does not dwell in peace; through the absence of skill in means, he is far away; through skill in means, he is not far away.

original: mi mthun gnyen po'i phyogs dag dang // sbyor dang de yi mnyam nyid dang // nyan thos la sogs mthong ba'i lam //
analyzed: mi mthun gnyen po'i phyogs dag dang // sbyor dang de yi mnyam nyid dang // nyan thos la sogs mthong ba'i lam //
translated: The counteragent to the adverse elements, the union with that, and the equality of that, are the path of vision of the sravakas, etc.

original: de 'dra kun shes nyid du 'dod //
analyzed: de 'dra kun shes nyid du 'dod //
translated: This is considered to be the state of all-knowledge.

original: ces gang gsungs pa de ni /
analyzed: ces gang gsungs pa de ni /
translated: This is what is stated.

original: 'dir rjes su 'das pa'i 'brel pa yin par blta'o //
analyzed: 'dir rjes su 'das pa'i 'brel pa yin par blta'o //
translated: Here, it should be seen as the related meaning of the subsequent passage.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i man ngag gi bstan bcos mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan las thams cad shes pa'i skabs spyod pa'i khyad par gyi le'u ste gsum pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i man ngag gi bstan bcos mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan las thams cad shes pa'i skabs spyod pa'i khyad par gyi le'u ste gsum pa'o //
translated: This concludes the third chapter, on the distinctive practice, from this Ornament of Clear Realization, a treatise on the instructions of the perfection of wisdom.

original: thams cad shes pa nyid bshad zin to /
analyzed: thams cad shes pa nyid bshad zin to /
translated: The state of all-knowledge has been explained.

original: // / da ni rnam pa kun mngon par rdzogs pa rtogs pa brjod par bya ba yin pas /
analyzed: // / da ni rnam pa kun mngon par rdzogs pa rtogs pa brjod par bya ba yin pas /
translated: Now, the complete and manifest realization of all aspects is to be discussed.

original: gzhi shes pa yi bye brag rnams //
analyzed: gzhi shes pa yi bye brag rnams //
translated: The various aspects of the knowledge of the basis

original: rnam pa zhes bya mtshan nyid de //
analyzed: rnam pa zhes bya mtshan nyid de //
translated: are called aspects, characteristics.

original: zhes bya ba gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs so //
translated: This is stated.

original: dngos po la dmigs pa ni gzhi shes pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po la dmigs pa ni gzhi shes pa'o //
translated: The object of observation of entities is the basis consciousness.

original: bye brag ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs gang gi gnyen po'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa ste ;
analyzed: bye brag ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs gang gi gnyen po'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa ste ;
translated: The distinctions are the characteristics of the antidotes to whatever is discordant.

original: dper na rtag par 'dzin pa la mi rtag pa la sogs pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na rtag par 'dzin pa la mi rtag pa la sogs pa bzhin no //
translated: For example, impermanence and so forth are the antidotes to the apprehension of permanence.

original: gnyen po'i phyogs kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gsum gyis bsdus pa yin pas /
analyzed: gnyen po'i phyogs kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gsum gyis bsdus pa yin pas /
translated: The side of the antidotes is also included within the three omnisciences.

original: kun mkhyen nyid ni rnam gsum phyir //
analyzed: kun mkhyen nyid ni rnam gsum phyir //
translated: Omniscience is threefold,

original: de ni rnam pa gsum du 'dod //🔽ces gsungs te /
analyzed: de ni rnam pa gsum du 'dod // ces gsungs te /
translated: and it is asserted to have three aspects.

original: rnam pa zhes bya ba'i tshig go //
analyzed: rnam pa zhes bya ba'i tshig go //
translated: The word “aspect” is a verbal noun.

original: de la 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rten du byas te /
analyzed: de la 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rten du byas te /
translated: In this regard, the four noble truths are the basis.🔽The teacher, in the context of the three omnisciences, teaches the number of aspects that exist for each truth.🔽The teacher, in the context of the three omnisciences, teaches the number of aspects that exist for each truth.🔽The teacher, in the context of the three omnisciences, teaches the number of aspects that exist for each truth.

original: thams cad shes pa nyid gsum gyi skabs kyi bden pa gang la rnam pa ji snyed yod pa de ston pas re zhig thams cad shes pa nyid kyi dbang du mdzad nas /🔽med pa'i rnam pa nas bzung ste //🔽mi g-yo ba yi rnam pa'i bar //
analyzed: thams cad shes pa nyid gsum gyi skabs kyi bden pa gang la rnam pa ji snyed yod pa de ston pas re zhig thams cad shes pa nyid kyi dbang du mdzad nas / med pa'i rnam pa nas bzung ste // mi g-yo ba yi rnam pa'i bar //
translated: The teacher, in the context of the three omnisciences, teaches the number of aspects that exist for each truth.🔽The teacher, in the context of the three omnisciences, teaches the number of aspects that exist for each truth.🔽The teacher, in the context of the three omnisciences, teaches the number of aspects that exist for each truth.🔽The teacher, in the context of the three omnisciences, teaches the number of aspects that exist for each truth.🔽The teacher, in the context of the three omnisciences, teaches the number of aspects that exist for each truth.🔽The teacher, in the context of the three omnisciences, teaches the number of aspects that exist for each truth.🔽The teacher, in the context of the three omnisciences, teaches the number of aspects that exist for each truth.🔽The teacher, in the context of the three omnisciences, teaches the number of aspects that exist for each truth.🔽The teacher, in the context of the three omnisciences, teaches the number of aspects that exist for each truth.🔽The teacher, in the context of the three omnisciences, teaches the number of aspects that exist for each truth.🔽The teacher, in the context of the three omnisciences, teaches the number of aspects that exist for each truth.🔽The teacher, in the context of the three omnisciences, teaches the number of aspects that exist for each truth.

original: bden pa so so la bzhi dang // lam la de ni bco lngar bshad //
analyzed: bden pa so so la bzhi dang // lam la de ni bco lngar bshad //
translated: The teacher, in the context of the three omnisciences, teaches the number of aspects that exist for each truth.🔽The teacher, in the context of the three omnisciences, teaches the number of aspects that

original: ces gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: ces gsungs pa yin no //
translated: This is what is being said.

original: de la sdug bsngal gyi bden pa'i rnam pa bzhi'i dbang du mdzad nas gsungs pa ni //🔽bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste /
analyzed: de la sdug bsngal gyi bden pa'i rnam pa bzhi'i dbang du mdzad nas gsungs pa ni // bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste /
translated: With regard to the four aspects of the truth of suffering, it is said:

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin @119b pa 'di ni ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin @119b pa 'di ni ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: Bhagavan, this perfection of wisdom is the perfection of non-existence.

original: rab 'byor nam mkha' med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor nam mkha' med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Subhuti, it is because space does not exist.

original: mi rtog don ni don med don //
analyzed: mi rtog don ni don med don //
translated: The meaning of non-conceptuality is the meaning of non-existence.

original: zhes bya ba'i tshul gyis so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i tshul gyis so //
translated: This is the way it is.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mnyam pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mnyam pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: This perfection of wisdom is the perfection of sameness.🔽Because the non-apprehension of all phenomena is the sameness.

original: chos thams cad mi dmigs pa mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal ba'i mi skye ba'i don zhes bya ba'i tshul gyis so //
analyzed: chos thams cad mi dmigs pa mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal ba'i mi skye ba'i don zhes bya ba'i tshul gyis so //
translated: This is the way it is, with regard to the meaning of the non-arising of suffering.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bden pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bden pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: This perfection of wisdom is the perfection of truth.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bya ba ni stong pa'i don ni dngos po med pa'i don to zhes bya ba'i tshul gyis so //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bya ba ni stong pa'i don ni dngos po med pa'i don to zhes bya ba'i tshul gyis so //
translated: Because of the emptiness of the unlimited, which is the same as the emptiness of non-existence.

original: brdzi bar bya ba ma yin pa'i rnam pa nyid kyis chos mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni bdag med pa'i rnam pa yin te /
analyzed: brdzi bar bya ba ma yin pa'i rnam pa nyid kyis chos mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni bdag med pa'i rnam pa yin te /
translated: Because of the non-apprehension of dharmas in the aspect of non-sublatability, which is the aspect of selflessness.

original: de ni mu stegs thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni mu stegs thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because it is not common to all the tirthikas.

original: kun 'byung gi bden pa'i rnam pa'i dbang du byas nas gsungs pa la /
analyzed: kun 'byung gi bden pa'i rnam pa'i dbang du byas nas gsungs pa la /
translated: With reference to the aspects of the truth of origination, it is said:

original: gzhi med pa'i rnam pas ming dang lus med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni rab tu bskyed pa'i don gyis gzhi ni rgyu la brjod do //
analyzed: gzhi med pa'i rnam pas ming dang lus med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni rab tu bskyed pa'i don gyis gzhi ni rgyu la brjod do //
translated: Because of the non-apprehension of name and form in the aspect of groundlessness, which is the aspect of non-production.

original: de la ming ni gzugs can ma yin pa'i phung po bzhi'o //
analyzed: de la ming ni gzugs can ma yin pa'i phung po bzhi'o //
translated: Name is the four non-material aggregates.

original: lus ni gzugs kyi phung po ste /
analyzed: lus ni gzugs kyi phung po ste /
translated: Form is the material aggregate.

original: de gnyi ga'i rgyu 'di yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de gnyi ga'i rgyu 'di yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because this is the cause of both of them.

original: nam mkha'i rnam pas dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: nam mkha'i rnam pas dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Because of the aspect of space, there is no in-and-out breathing.

original: kun 'byung gi rnam pas te /
analyzed: kun 'byung gi rnam pas te /
translated: This is the aspect of origination.

original: 'dod chags la sogs pa kun 'byung ba ni sngon dang phyi ma'i skad cig ma lhan cig gnas pa med pa'i phyir dang / da ltar gyi'ang 'gags pas zin pa nyid kyis dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba dag dang 'dra bar nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i chos nyid kyis mtshon pa'i phyir ro //🔽brjod du med pa'i rnam pas rnam pa rtog pa dang rnam par dpyod pas dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni rab tu skye ba'i rnam pas te /
analyzed: 'dod chags la sogs pa kun 'byung ba ni sngon dang phyi ma'i skad cig ma lhan cig gnas pa med pa'i phyir dang / da ltar gyi'ang 'gags pas zin pa nyid kyis dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba dag dang 'dra bar nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i chos nyid kyis mtshon pa'i phyir ro // brjod du med pa'i rnam pas rnam pa rtog pa dang rnam par dpyod pas dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni rab tu skye ba'i rnam pas te /
translated: The origination of attachment, etc. is not simultaneous with the prior and subsequent moments, and because of the present moment’s being seized by cessation, it is like in-and-out breathing, and is indicated by the reality that is similar to space.🔽Because of the inexpressible aspect, there is no apprehension by discursive thought and discernment.

original: rtog pa dang rnam par dpyod pa ni las 'byung ba'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rtog pa dang rnam par dpyod pa ni las 'byung ba'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is the aspect of origination, because discursive thought and discernment are the cause of the origination of action.

original: ming med pa'i rnam pas tshor ba la sogs pa'i phung po dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni rkyen gyi rnam pa ste /
analyzed: ming med pa'i rnam pas tshor ba la sogs pa'i phung po dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni rkyen gyi rnam pa ste /
translated: The aspect of signlessness is due to the non-apprehension of the aggregates of feeling, etc.

original: gtso cher tshor ba nyams su myong ba ni yang srid pa 'byung ba'i rkyen nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //🔽'gog pa'i @120a * //
analyzed: gtso cher tshor ba nyams su myong ba ni yang srid pa 'byung ba'i rkyen nyid yin pa'i phyir ro // 'gog pa'i @120a * //
translated: The aspect of conditionality is due to the fact that the experience of feeling is the principal condition for the arising of renewed existence.

original: bden pa'i rnam pa'i dbang du mdzad nas gsungs pa ni /🔽'gro ba med pa'i rnam pas /🔽chos thams cad 'gro ba med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni 'gog pa'i rnam pas te /
analyzed: bden pa'i rnam pa'i dbang du mdzad nas gsungs pa ni / 'gro ba med pa'i rnam pas / chos thams cad 'gro ba med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni 'gog pa'i rnam pas te /
translated: The aspects of the truth of cessation are stated as follows:🔽The aspect of non-going is due to the non-going of all dharmas.

original: de ni lus kyi mngon sum du bya ba yin gyi /
analyzed: de ni lus kyi mngon sum du bya ba yin gyi /
translated: The aspect of cessation is due to the fact that cessation is directly experienced by the body.

original: sod nas thob par bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: sod nas thob par bya ba ma yin te /
translated: It is not to be attained by the body after it has ceased,

original: gang 'gags pa de ni gang du'ang song ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang 'gags pa de ni gang du'ang song ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because that which has ceased does not go anywhere.🔽The aspect of non-grasping is due to the non-apprehension of all dharmas.

original: mi 'phrogs pa'i rnam pas chos thams cad gzung du med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni zhi ba'i rnam pa ste /
analyzed: mi 'phrogs pa'i rnam pas chos thams cad gzung du med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni zhi ba'i rnam pa ste /
translated: The aspect of peace is due to the fact that the body is not agitated by the defilements.

original: yul gyi ngo bo ni gzung bar bya bar rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i tshul gyis so //🔽mi zad pa'i rnam pas tshes thams cad shin tu zad cing 'gags pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni gya nom pa'i rnam pa ste /
analyzed: yul gyi ngo bo ni gzung bar bya bar rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i tshul gyis so // mi zad pa'i rnam pas tshes thams cad shin tu zad cing 'gags pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni gya nom pa'i rnam pa ste /
translated: The nature of the object is the mode called “realization as the apprehended object.”🔽The aspect of inexhaustibility is the mode called “the cessation of all the phases of existence,” because all phenomena are devoid of cessation.🔽The aspect of excellence is the mode called “the cessation of all the phases of existence,” because all phenomena are devoid of cessation.

original: chos thams cad ni shin tu zad pa dang ldan pa ma yin te /🔽de'i rang bzhin ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i tshul gyis so //
analyzed: chos thams cad ni shin tu zad pa dang ldan pa ma yin te / de'i rang bzhin ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i tshul gyis so //
translated: The aspect of liberation is the mode called “the non-arising of all phenomena and their non-cessation,” because all phenomena are devoid of cessation.🔽The aspect of the truth of the path is the mode called “the non-arising of all phenomena and their non-cessation,” because all phenomena are devoid of cessation.🔽The aspect of the truth of the path is the mode called “the non-arising of all phenomena and their non-cessation,” because all phenomena are devoid of cessation.

original: skye ba med pa'i rnam pas chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang 'gag pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni nges par 'byung ba'i rnam pa ste /🔽ji ltar yongs su brtags pa'i chos yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir su zhig skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur zhes pa'i tshul gyis so //
analyzed: skye ba med pa'i rnam pas chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang 'gag pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni nges par 'byung ba'i rnam pa ste / ji ltar yongs su brtags pa'i chos yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir su zhig skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur zhes pa'i tshul gyis so //
translated: The aspect of the truth of the path is the mode called “the non-arising of all phenomena and their non-cessation,” because all phenomena are devoid of cessation.🔽The aspect of the truth of the path is the mode called “the non-arising of all phenomena and their non-cessation,” because all phenomena are devoid of cessation.

original: lam gyi bden pa'i rnam pa ni bco lnga las bzhi ni nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa'i gnyen por gyur pa yin la /
analyzed: lam gyi bden pa'i rnam pa ni bco lnga las bzhi ni nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa'i gnyen por gyur pa yin la /
translated: The aspect of the truth of the path is the mode called “the non-arising of all phenomena and their non-cessation,” because all phenomena are devoid of cessation.🔽The aspect of the truth of the path is the mode called “the non-arising of all phenomena and their non-cessation,” because all phenomena are devoid of cessation.🔽The aspect of the truth of the path is the mode called “the non-arising of all phenomena and their non-cessation,” because all phenomena are devoid of cessation.🔽The aspect of the truth of the path is the mode called “the non-arising of all phenomena and their non-cessation,” because all phenomena are devoid of cessation.🔽The aspect of the truth of the path is the mode called “the non-arising of all phenomena and their non-cessation,” because all phenomena are devoid of cessation.🔽The aspect of the truth of the path is the mode called “the non-arising of all phenomena and their non-cessation,” because all phenomena are devoid of cessation.

original: lhag ma ni shes bya'i sgrib pa'i gnyen po yin no //
analyzed: lhag ma ni shes bya'i sgrib pa'i gnyen po yin no //
translated: The remaining aspects are the counteragents to the obscurations of the knowable.

original: gang gi phyir snga ma'i dbang du byas nas gsungs pa la /
analyzed: gang gi phyir snga ma'i dbang du byas nas gsungs pa la /
translated: The aspects of the path are stated in relation to the former.

original: byed pa po med pa'i rnam pas /🔽byed pa po mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni lam gyi rnam pa ste /
analyzed: byed pa po med pa'i rnam pas / byed pa po mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni lam gyi rnam pa ste /
translated: In the absence of an agent,🔽the non-apprehension of an agent is due to the fact that it does not exist.

original: de ni byed pa po ma yin pa nyid kyis byed pa po 'dzin pa'i gnyen po yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni byed pa po ma yin pa nyid kyis byed pa po 'dzin pa'i gnyen po yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is the aspect of the path because it is the counteragent to the apprehension of an agent through the fact that it is not an agent.

original: shes pa po med pa'i rnam pas /
analyzed: shes pa po med pa'i rnam pas /
translated: In the absence of an experiencer,

original: shes pa po dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //🔽zhes bya ba ni rigs pa'i rnam pa ste /🔽ma lus par rtogs pa ni rigs pa ste /
analyzed: shes pa po dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro // zhes bya ba ni rigs pa'i rnam pa ste / ma lus par rtogs pa ni rigs pa ste /
translated: the non-apprehension of an experiencer is due to the fact that it does not exist.🔽This is the aspect of reasoning because it is the cause of the knowledge of the absence of an experiencer.

original: lam ni shes pa po'i rnam par rtogs pa'i gnyen po yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lam ni shes pa po'i rnam par rtogs pa'i gnyen po yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The complete knowledge of the absence of an experiencer is reasoning because the path is the counteragent to the false view that there is an experiencer.

original: 'phro ba med pa'i rnam pas /
analyzed: 'phro ba med pa'i rnam pas /
translated: In the absence of proliferation,🔽the non-apprehension of death and rebirth is due to the fact that they do not exist.

original: 'chi ba dang skye ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni sgrub pa'i rnam pa ste /
analyzed: 'chi ba dang skye ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni sgrub pa'i rnam pa ste /
translated: This is the aspect of accomplishment because it is the cause of the knowledge of the absence of death and rebirth.

original: lam ni dman pa dang khyad par du 'phags pa'i gnas skabs dag spong ba dang len pa'i gnyen po yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: lam ni dman pa dang khyad par du 'phags pa'i gnas skabs dag spong ba dang len pa'i gnyen po yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: The path is the antidote for abandoning and accepting the states of inferior and superior stages.

original: so sor rtogs pa ni sgrub @120b pa yin no zhes bya ba'i tshul gyis so //
analyzed: so sor rtogs pa ni sgrub @120b pa yin no zhes bya ba'i tshul gyis so //
translated: The mode is that discernment is the practice.

original: 'dul ba med pa'i rnam pas /
analyzed: 'dul ba med pa'i rnam pas /
translated: The mode of being without training is🔽because all phenomena are naturally without training.

original: chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis gdul ba med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni nges par 'byin pa'i rnam pa ste /
analyzed: chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis gdul ba med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni nges par 'byin pa'i rnam pa ste /
translated: This is the mode of definite emergence,

original: chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa gang yin pa ni nyon mongs pa 'dul bar nges par 'byung ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bas so //
analyzed: chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa gang yin pa ni nyon mongs pa 'dul bar nges par 'byung ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bas so //
translated: because the emptiness of all phenomena by nature is not the definite emergence of subduing the afflictions.

original: shes bya'i sgrib pa'i gnyen po lam ni rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: shes bya'i sgrib pa'i gnyen po lam ni rnam pa gnyis te /
translated: The path that is the antidote to the obscurations to omniscience is twofold:

original: bsgom pa'i lam zag pa dang bcas pa dang / mthong ba'i lam zag pa med pa'o //
analyzed: bsgom pa'i lam zag pa dang bcas pa dang / mthong ba'i lam zag pa med pa'o //
